import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Query organization types (GET)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/types/query"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns organization types using simple query parameters and paging. Use this endpoint to browse all available types or to obtain OrganizationTypeId values for update, delete, or assignment workflows.

**Workflow Example**
1. Call [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/types/query](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization-types-by-query-get) with $top/$skip to page through results.
2. Extract `Items[].OrganizationTypeId` and pass them to [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/types/ids](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization-types-by-ids) or [PUT /api/v1.0/organizations/types/ids/update](/docs/api/organizations/update-organization-types-by-ids).

**Minimal Required Fields**: None.

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"$top","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"$skip","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Query results returned.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response wrapper for a list of OrganizationTypes.","properties":{"Items":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Represents a type/category for organizations (event venues).","properties":{"OrganizationTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the organization type."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the organization type was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the organization type was last modified."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the organization type has been soft-deleted."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the site this organization type belongs to. Null for global types."},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["Global","Site"],"description":"Scope of the organization type - Global or Site-specific."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the organization type."}},"title":"OrganizationType"}},"Paging":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Pagination details returned with paged user search results.","properties":{"TotalRows":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of rows available across all pages.","example":54343},"PageCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of pages available for the current query.","example":10869},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of records returned per page.","example":5},"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","description":"Zero-based index of the current page returned in the response.","example":0}},"title":"PagingMetadata"}],"nullable":true,"type":"object"},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned by the API when a request fails.","properties":{"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code associated with the failure","example":401},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the error","example":"Attempted to perform an unauthorized operation."}},"required":["StatusCode","Message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}},"title":"OrganizationTypeListResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
